item.title: Despite Being Set in 2024, ‘The Morning Show’ Won’t Address Trump’s Reelection in Season 4
item.description: A time jump picks things up two years after the events of season three, but “this season ends right before the election,” EP Mimi Leder confirms.

item.title: Charlie Day “Would Be Up for” Third ‘Horrible Bosses’ Film, Has Had “Conversations About It”
item.description: The ‘It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia’ actor is aligned with Jennifer Aniston, who recently expressed her desire to return to the R-rated franchise.

item.title: ‘The Morning Show’ Heads Into a Risky “Reset” in Steamy Season 4 Trailer
item.description: There’s lots of tension — professional and otherwise — in the latest preview for the Apple series starring Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon, which is set to return Sept. 17.
